section.title: Failing the test
section.para: The fail action will generate an exception in order to terminate the test case with error. The test case will therefore not be successful in the reporting.
The user can specify a custom message that will be used in the exception to describe the error root cause. Following code example will clarify the fail usage:
section.programlisting: <testcase name="failTest"> <actions> <fail message="Test will fail with custom message"/> </actions> </testcase>
